item.description:
Where and when:

Meet just outside the Park Street T-stop at 6:30 p.m. I'll be wearing a BookCrossing t-shirt and holding a small sign (8 1/2 x 11) that says "BookCrossing" with the Ballycumber logo on it (that's the little yellow running book). I'll stand there with the sign for about 20 minutes, and anyone who comes later than that can find us on the lawn -- I'll prop up the sign.


What to bring:

Something to sit on -- lawn chair, towel, jacket, or something.


Cost:

Completely free! No tickets needed or meetup donation suggested for this event.
item.name: Free Shakespeare in Boston Common
